readable.title: 2600170955_bf30c5d5c0
readable.content: a boy in a green shirt is pushing a shopping cart in which a boy in a yellow shirt is riding . An enthusiastic boy pushes a shopping cart containing a smiling boy . One boy pushes a shopping cart with another smaller boy standing up in it . Two boys play with a shopping cart in a parking lot . Two small boys play in a shopping cart in a parking lot .
